com.knowledgeplayers.grar.structure.activity.quizz.QuizzItem

type
class
Model for quizz propositions

Constructor

new(content : String, ref : String, ?isAnswer : Bool, ?isChecked : Bool)
parameters
content : Text of the item
isAnswer : True if the item is the answer. False by default
isChecked : True if the item is checked. False by default
Constructor

Instance Variables

content : String

Text of the item

isAnswer(default,null) : Bool

True if the item is the answer to the question

isChecked : Bool

True if the item is checked

ref : String

Ref of the item

Instance Methods

isRightAnswered() : Bool

returns
true if the item has been checked and is a correct answer

toString() : String

returns
a string-based representation of the item
